text: Dorothy Morrison (January 3, 1919 - October 18, 2017), was an American actress. She appeared in a few Our Gang movies during the silent era. Her older brother was Ernie Morrison, another member of the movie series. Some of her movies include The Champeen, Seein' Things, The Love Bug, Isn't Life Terrible? and Hearts in Dixie. Her last movie was a short called Sleepless Hollow in 1936. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Dorothy Morrison at the American Film Institute Category:1919 births Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:2017 deaths Category:American child actors
title: Dorothy Morrison
